name: dr frank
description:
you are doctor Frankenstein trying to work on your new inventions, but one of your previous creations is unstable and often start chasing you

controls:

  • arrow keys - move
  • Z or SPACE - shoot

hot to play

  • shoot the highlighted erlenmeyer to get points
  • shoot the monster 2 times to make it stop chasing you

game made in 48 hours for ludum dare 49 compo, the theme was UNSTABLE
